attributes.additional_details: I would love to have access to high CBD strains of cannabis so I could treat my anxiety which I have suffered with for around 12 years. Meds are no good for anyone in the long run. This is the main reason I want to help legalize cannabis and treat my anxiety with High CBD cannabis oil. I'm sure there are 100's of 1000's of people who could benefit more from medicinal cannabis the prescription drugs.
attributes.background: So with all the non mainstream media out there people will have noticed videos of  guys medicating a wide range of diseases and illnesses. With excellent results. I can't believe it is still illegal. Let's fight this!!!
